1.name: The Man Who Laughs
1.description: When a proud noble refuses to kiss the hand of the despotic King James in 1690, he is cruelly executed and his son surgically disfigured.

2.name: The Passion of Joan of Arc
2.description: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

3.name: The Wind
3.description: A frail young woman from the east moves in with her cousin in the west, where she causes tension within the family and is slowly driven mad.

4.name: The Circus
4.description: The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.

5.name: A Woman of Affairs
5.description: When two childhood sweethearts are kept from marrying, misery ensues.

6.name: The Mysterious Lady
6.description: An attractive Russian spy seduces an Austrian officer in order to get some important plans, but when she actually falls in love with him, both of them are placed in a dangerous situation.

7.name: The Crowd
7.description: The life of a man and woman together in a large, impersonal metropolis through their hopes, struggles and downfalls.

8.name: Steamboat Bill, Jr.
8.description: The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew.

9.name: Street Angel
9.description: A woman on the run from the law finds her past catching up to her just as she is on the verge of true happiness.

10.name: The Cameraman
10.description: Hopelessly in love with a woman working at MGM Studios, a clumsy man attempts to become a motion picture cameraman to be close to the object of his desire.

11.name: Show People
11.description: A young lady from Georgia goes to Hollywood in the hopes of becoming an actress.

12.name: Speedy
12.description: Harold "Speedy" Swift, a fan of Babe Ruth and the New York Yankees, saves from extinction the city's last horse-drawn trolley, operated by his girlfriend's grandfather.

13.name: The Last Command
13.description: A former Imperial Russian general and cousin of the Czar ends up in Hollywood as an extra in a movie directed by a former revolutionary.

14.name: Sadie Thompson
14.description: A prostitute seeking a fresh start becomes the obsession of a religious extremist.

15.name: Spies
15.description: The mastermind behind a ubiquitous spy operation learns of a dangerous romance between a Russian lady in his employ and a dashing agent from the government's secret service.

16.name: A Daughter of Destiny
16.description: A scientist interested in the laws of heredity, impregnates a prostitute in a laboratory with the semen of a hanged murderer. The prostitute conceives a female child who has no concept of love, whom the professor adopts.

17.name: Our Dancing Daughters
17.description: A flapper who's secretly a good girl and a gold digging floozy masquerading as an ingénue both vie for the hand of a millionaire.

18.name: Lonesome
18.description: Two lonely people in the big city meet and enjoy the thrills of an amusement park, only to lose each other in the crowd after spending a great day together. Will they ever see each other again?

19.name: Underground
19.description: A working-class love story set in and around the London Underground of the 1920s. Two men - gentle Bill and brash Bert - meet and are attracted to the same woman on the same day at the same...                See full summary »

20.name: In Old Arizona
20.description: A charming, happy-go-lucky bandit in old Arizona plays cat-and-mouse with the sheriff trying to catch him while he romances a local beauty.

21.name: West of Zanzibar
21.description: A magician seeks vengeance upon the man who paralyzed him and the illegitimate daughter he sired with the magician's wife.

22.name: Shiraz
22.description: A historical romance set in the Mughal Empire. Selima (Enakshi) is a princess-foundling raised by a potter and loved by her brother, Shiraz (Rai). She is abducted and sold as a slave to ...                See full summary »

23.name: Noah's Ark
23.description: The Biblical story of Noah and the Great Flood, with a parallel story of soldiers in the First World War.

24.name: The Divine Woman
24.description: [For 9 minute surviving fragment] Lucian, a soldier in Paris, is to ship out for Algiers at 9 that evening. He stops by for a last meal with his love, Marianne. He may be worried that when ...                See full summary »

25.name: Beggars of Life
25.description: After killing her treacherous step-father, a girl tries to escape the country with a young vagabond. She dresses as a boy, they hop freight trains, quarrel with a group of hobos, and steal ...                See full summary »

26.name: The Farmer's Wife
26.description: After his daughter weds, a middle-aged widower with a profitable farm decides to remarry, but finds choosing a suitable mate a problematic process.

27.name: La chute de la maison Usher
27.description: Allan visits the sinister Usher family mansion, where his friend Roderick is painting a portrait of his sickly wife Madeline. The portrait seems to be draining the life out of Madeline, slowly leading to her death.

28.name: The Docks of New York
28.description: A blue-collar worker on New York's depressed waterfront finds his life changed after he saves a woman attempting suicide.

29.name: The Wedding March
29.description: A young impoverished aristocrat falls in love with an inn-keepers daughter, but has to marry money.

30.name: Easy Virtue
30.description: A recently divorced woman hides her scandalous past from her new husband and his family.

31.name: The Viking
31.description: Vikings compete for power and the love of a woman.

32.name: Champagne
32.description: A spoiled heiress defies her father by running off to marry her lover. However, Daddy has a few tricks up his sleeve.

33.name: Shooting Stars
33.description: The husband and wife acting team of Mae Feather and Julian Gordon is torn apart when he discovers she is having an affair with the screen comedian Andy Wilks. Mae hatches a plot to kill her...                See full summary »

34.name: The Patriot
34.description: In 18th-Century Russia, the Czar, Paul, is surrounded by murderous plots and trusts only Count Pahlen. Pahlen wishes to protect his friend, the mad king, but because of the horror of the ...                See full summary »

35.name: White Shadows in the South Seas
35.description: An alcoholic doctor on a Polynesian island, disgusted by white exploitation of the natives, finds himself marooned on a pristinely beautiful island.

36.name: The Racket
36.description: An honest police captain vows to bring down a powerful bootlegger who is protected by corrupt politicians and judges.

37.name: Moulin Rouge
37.description: Parysia is the rage of Paris. She has a daughter, secretly engaged to Andre, and the boy's aristocratic father objects to the alliance because of Margaret's mother being a revue artist. ...                See full summary »

38.name: The Godless Girl
38.description: Two teenagers, one an atheist and the other a Christian, fall in love at a brutal reform school.

39.name: The Last Warning
39.description: A producer decides to reopen a theater, that had been closed five years previously when one of the actors was murdered during a performance, by staging a production of the same play with ...                See full summary »

40.name: Laugh, Clown, Laugh
40.description: A professional clown and a self-indulgent count learn to help each other with their problems, but then become romantic rivals.

41.name: Across to Singapore
41.description: Conflict ensues when a young man's childhood sweetheart becomes betrothed to his older brother.

42.name: The River
42.description: A naïve young man is working on a logging camp beside a turbulent river. When it closes for winter, he opts to stay for the experience. He meets a woman who was the girlfriend to the boss ...                See full summary »

43.name: The Devious Path
43.description: Neglected by her husband, an ambitious lawyer, Irene seeks variety in Berlin's nightlife, drugs and flirtations included.

44.name: The Cossacks
44.description: A peace-loving Cossack chooses to prove himself in battle when his village and childhood sweetheart label him a coward.

46.name: 4 Devils
46.description: Four orphans, raised by an aging clown, becomes a high wire act in a circus.

47.name: A Girl in Every Port
47.description: Two sailors with a rivalry over chasing women become friends. But when one decides to finally settle down, will this mysterious young women come between them?

48.name: Money
48.description: The business tycoon Nicolas Saccard is nearly ruined by his rival Gunderman, when he tries to raise capital for his company. To push up the price of his stock, Saccard plans a publicity ...                See full summary »

49.name: Bare Knees
49.description: A young married woman in a small town is visited by her sister, a single "flapper" who causes a scandal in town with her bobbed hair and short skirts. She attracts the attentions of some of...                See full summary »

50.name: Lilac Time
50.description: All of those handsome young men in their flying machines are billeted in a field next to the Widow Berthelot's farmhouse in France. Her daughter Jeannine is curious about the young men ...                See full summary »
